snippet.title: Hunt: Showdown 1896 Post Malone's Murder Circus - Exclusive Trailer
snippet.description:
Ringmaster Post Malone recounts the story behind the HelioStone in this exclusive new Hunt: Showdown 1896 trailer. The Hunt: Showdown 1896 Post Malone's Murder Circus in-game event arrives in the first-person bounty-hunting game on December 12, 2024 and will run until February 10, 2025 on PS5 (PlayStation 5), Xbox Series X/S, and PC.

Featuring a new monster, weapon variants, themed hunter skins, and more, Post Malone’s Murder Circus invites players into a nightmarish world where a once-traveling carnival has been transformed by the mysterious HelioStone artifact.

#HuntShowdown #PostMalone #Gaming
